vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πρᾰσι-ά,
Ionic dialect πρᾰσ-ιή, ἡ, bed in a garden, garden-plot, [LXX+8th c.BC+] in companies or groups, [NT] and so properly bed of leeks.)
__II a surgical instrument, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: group; in context this word is doubled: group by group
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
group; in context this word is doubled: group by group
a small area, or bed in a garden; troponym a company of persons disposed in squares; from the Hebrew, πρασιαὶ πρασιαι, in groups, by areas, by squares, like beds in a garden, Mk. 6:40*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (lit. lote de jardín) grupo ; en grupos
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 字意: 花床, 花園地
2) 一群一群人(可 6:40)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 字意: 花床, 花园地
2) 一群一群人(可 6:40)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: từng hàng; từng nhóm // bồn hoa.
